articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Holds U.S. Wholly Responsible for Nuclear Crisis on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Holds U.S. Wholly Responsible for Nuclear Crisis on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- It was none other than the United States that spawned the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula in the light of its root cause and background against which it surfaced and from the viewpoint of the responsibility for the present situation. Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes this in a signed article.
					 The nuclear issue surfaced on the Korean Peninsula is due to the U.S introduction of nukes into south Korea, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The DPRK government has not ceased even a moment the struggle for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula against the U.S. introduction of nukes into south Korea, regarding the issue of removing the U.S. nuclear threat from the Korean Peninsula as a vital issue related to the destiny of the nation and an inevitable requirement for ensuring peace and security in Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 However, the U.S. has reacted to the sincere efforts of the DPRK by pursuing undisguised moves for a nuclear war. 
					
					 The nuclear issue on the peninsula festered after the appearance of the Bush administration.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK and its nuclear war moves compelled the DPRK to have access to nuclear deterrent for self-defence and bolster it up. 
					
					 The U.S. made much fuss, expressing "deep concern over north Korea's access to nuclear weapons," taking issue with the nuclear test for self-defence conducted by the DPRK to cope with its ever-increasing nuclear threat and its evermore undisguised moves for a nuclear war. It is working hard to create the impression that the DPRK has a "nuclear ambition" in a bid to label it a "nuclear criminal," keeping mum about the background against which it came to have access to nukes and its purport and seriously falsifying the essence and truth about it. But this proved futile. 
					
					 The DPRK's accession to nuclear weapons is not aimed at threatening and pressurizing other countries and mounting preemptive attacks on them unlike the U.S. The DPRK's nuclear deterrent is, to all intents and purposes, of self-defensive nature and has an aim and mission to champion peace. The Korean people are highly proud and honored to defend the peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of Northeast Asia as it has the full-fledged status of a nuclear weapons state in view of the U.S. moves for a nuclear war. 
					
					 The DPRK will bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence in the future, too, in order to cope with the U.S. undisguised nuclear threat and moves for a  nuclear war.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop kicking up a harmful extreme confrontation racket against the DPRK, cogitating about the nature and essence of the present serious nuclear crisis and its aftermath. This would do the U.S. good.

articles.title: Puppet Prosecution's Suppression of Activists for Reunification Flayed
articles.content:
Puppet Prosecution's Suppression of Activists for Reunification Flayed
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration issued a statement on June 24 denouncing the puppet prosecution for its suppression of members of the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon).
					 The statement accused the prosecution of detaining and indicting that day Chairman Ri Kyu Jae, Director of the Secretariat Ri Kyong Won and Chairperson for Information Choe Un A of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon on charge of the violation of the notorious "National Security Law".
					
					 The prosecution is now calling into question the activities of the organization which were legitimately conducted in the past, it said, adding that this is aimed at incriminating the non-governmental movement for reunification and totally suppressing the people's freedom of expression related to the south-north issues.
					
					 It branded the prosecution's suppression as a move to dampen the desire of the nation for reunification and threaten the people out in the movement for issuing declarations on the situation.
					
					 It urged the prosecution not to invoke the fascist law at the beck and call of the "Chongwadae" but stop the suppression of the reunification movement and immediately set free members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon.

articles.title: Puppet Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Accused
articles.content:
Puppet Authorities' Human Rights Abuses Accused
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance of Youth and Students for Korea's Reunification released a statement on June 24 denouncing the puppet Ministry of Justice for its human rights abuses.
					 The statement accused the ministry of blocking the correspondence of Yun Ki Jin, chairman of the headquarters still behind bars, and secretly destroying his letters.
					
					 Noting that Yun has consistently conducted his acts of sending his letters reflecting his views on the present situation and the reunification movement behind bars, the statement expressed resentment at the authorities who are depriving him of even elementary human rights.
					
					 Correspondences of Choe Han Uk, executive chairperson of the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, and Kang Jin Gu, former executive chairperson of the solidarity, came to a halt due to the authorities' undemocratic human rights abuses.
					
					 It has been recently disclosed that the ministry arranged a cell in order to arrest Roh Moo Hyun, former "president", at Anyang prison, the statement said, deploring that south Korea has turned into a barren land of human rights under the Lee regime.
					
					 It declared that the youth and students in south Korea would wage an all-out struggle to force the Lee Myung Bak dictatorial regime to step down in order to realize democracy and achieve independent reunification.

articles.title: Puppet Police's Massacres during Korean War Disclosed in S. Korea
articles.content:
Puppet Police's Massacres during Korean War Disclosed in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Mun Gil, professor at Pusan University of Foreign Studies, on June 25 laid bare the killings of at least 120 civilians perpetrated by the puppet police in the area of  Yongchon, North Kyongsang Province, during the Korean War, according to Yonhap News of south Korea.
					 He noted that in those days the police indiscriminately arrested innocent inhabitants under the pretext of ferreting out members of the Workers' Party of south Korea in Hwabuk-myon, Rimgo-myon, Jayang-myon and other places of Yongchon County and took them to Ryanghang-ri, Rimgo-myon, and shot them to death.
					
					 Inhabitants in the surrounding area also testified to this massacre, he stressed.
					
					 He demanded the authorities concerned start unearthing their remains at an early date, properly probe the truth and give vent to the grudge of the victims.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of University Students Movement Protested
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Suppression of University Students Movement Protested
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Representatives of the General Student Council of Hongik University and the Fellow Students Association for Democracy and other organizations in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on June 25 in protest against the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' arrest of the former chairman of the Seoul District Federation of University Student Councils (Sochongryon) under the south Korean Federation of University Student Councils.
					 At the press conference speakers said that it was entirely unwarranted for the authorities to have made a search for him and illegally taken him away for the mere reason that he took part in the university student movement though he has led an ordinary social life after graduating from the university where he was active as chairman of Sochongryon and chairman of the General Student Council of Hongik University.
					
					 Referring to the fact that the authorities arrested him on charge of violation of the notorious "National Security Law" and the "Law on Assembly and Demonstration" and are conducting an investigation into him at an anti-communist room, they termed this reckless act a crackdown on youth and students and peaceable citizens desirous of social democracy.
					
					 They stressed that the tyrannical action taken by them was nothing but the last-ditch effort of the Lee Myung Bak "government" to tide over the worst ruling crisis as it was part of such suppression under the pretext of security as the crackdown targeted against the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration and the South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification.

articles.title: North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Democratic Congo
articles.content:
North-South Joint Declaration Supported by Democratic Congo
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Democratic Congo on June 20 sent a note to the DPRK embassy in Democratic Congo in support of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The note supported the said declaration, a signpost of the unity of the Korean nation and reunification, as it reflects the unanimous desire of the Korean people for the country's reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Feats Praised
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Party Leadership Feats Praised
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK ambassador to Mali on June 16 paid a courtesy call on Dioncounda Traore, chairman of the National Executive Committee of the African Party for the Solidarity and Justice of Mali. 
					 The chairman expressed his admiration at the feats performed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il in leading the Workers' Party of Korea for nearly half a century. He went on:
					
					 The party, army and people of the DPRK, united single-mindedly under the Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Il, have firmly defended the sovereignty of the country and registered great achievements in building a great prosperous and powerful nation while foiling the evermore undisguised high-handed and arbitrary practices of the imperialists.
					
					 This is instilling conviction and courage into the progressive parties and people aspiring after justice, peace and independent development.
					
					 We always remember President Kim Il Sung for paying great attention to the struggle of the Malian people for independence and progress and extending disinterested support and encouragement to it and are pleased with the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries developing favorably day by day.

articles.title: U.S. Urged to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Urged to Roll back Its Hostile Policy towards DPRK 
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Organizations of Italy and the Czech Republic released statements on June 19 on the occasion of the month of international solidarity with the Korean people.
					 The Italian Nino Pasti International Fund in its statement pointed out that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is deteriorating day by day due to the U.S. unjust hostile policy towards the DPRK, noting that it took an option to have nuclear deterrent because of the U.S. moves to stifle the DPRK and its nuclear threat.
					
					 The statement stressed that it is a legitimate sovereign right for the DPRK to enlist every means possible to protect itself from the military threat of the U.S. imperialists further increasing with each passing day. 
					
					 The Czech, Moravian, Silesian Trade Unions' Association in its statement asserted that the U.S. should give up its policy towards the Korean Peninsula and make a policy switchover with a cooperative approach as it is directly responsible for the Korean issue.
					
					 The statement strongly urged the U.S. to withdraw its occupation troops from south Korea and immediately roll back its hostile policy towards the DPRK.

articles.title: DPRK's Strong Counter-Measures for Self-Defence Supported in Mexico
articles.content:
DPRK's Strong Counter-Measures for Self-Defence Supported in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- We hail and fully support the just strong counter-measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK to defend the dignity and sovereignty of the nation, supreme interests of the country, at the present phase of all-out confrontation with the U.S. 
					 Cuautemoc Amezcua Dromundo, first secretary of the Central Committee of the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, said this in a statement issued on June 19 on the occasion of the June 25-July 27 month of anti-U.S. joint struggle.
					
					 The Korean people under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, are dynamically advancing the cause of national reunification while pushing aside every challenge and obstructive moves of the anti-reunification forces, upholding the banner of "By our nation itself," a banner of independence, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 We extend firm solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle to inject fresh energy into the movement for national reunification under the uplifted slogan of "Let us dynamically advance along the road of independent reunification, upholding the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration!"
					
					 We vehemently condemn the Lee Myung Bak group for having totally negated the north-south declarations and pushed into the worst crisis the inter-Korean relations, which had developed favorably, as soon as it came to power and the U.S. for perpetrating anti-DPRK acts over its satellite launch and nuclear test for peaceful purposes by instigating even the UNSC.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days Observed Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days Observed Abroad
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- Meetings, lectures, film shows and book exhibitions took place in Romania, India and the Czech Republic between June 10 and 15 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 Displayed in the venues of the functions were works of Kim Jong Il, books praising the peerlessly great persons and publications introducing the Juche idea.
					
					 Speeches were made at the functions.
					
					 Daniel Dediu, chairman of the Romanian Workers' Association, said that Kim Jong Il has strengthened and developed the WPK into an invincible party by carrying forward President Kim Il Sung's cause and led to victory the Korean people in their struggle to defend socialism while smashing the U.S.-led imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK.
					
					 B.C. Gupta, chairman of the Juche Idea Study Society of Indian Delhi, stressed that Kim Jong Il's 45 years were a history which ushered in a new era of Songun revolution with the might of arms, taking hold on the Party and the army, and in which it has won one victory after another with the might of ideology and guaranteed its eternal victory by consolidating the single-minded unity of the whole society in every way.
					
					 Jiri Grunbaoer, chief secretary of the Committee of the Central Czech Province who is member of the Presidium of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party, highly praised Kim Jong Il for having turned the DPRK into a powerful socialist fortress and an invincible military power capable of beating back any aggression of imperialism.
					
					 The participants of the film shows watched the Korean video "Extravaganza 'Arirang'".
					
					 Meanwhile, figures of Syria and South Africa issued statements on the occasion of the 45th anniversary of Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Bulletin Issued in Peru to Mark Important Days of DPRK
articles.content:
Bulletin Issued in Peru to Mark Important Days of DPRK
Pyongyang, June 28 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism issued a bulletin on June 15 on the occasions of the 45th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and the 9th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 joint declaration.
					 In an article titled "Great 45 Years", the bulletin noted that Kim Jong Il has further developed and enriched the Juche idea fathered by President Kim Il Sung with his outstanding ideological and theoretical activities.
					
					 This serves as the greatest exploit Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of humankind, the bulletin said, and went on;
					
					 Kim Jong Il authored a lot of works including "On the Juche Idea", "Socialism Is a Science", "Giving Priority to Ideological Work Is Essential for Accomplishing Socialism" and "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung".
					
					 Thanks to the experienced and tested leadership of Kim Jong Il possessed of an iron will, socialism in the DPRK is victoriously advancing along its road despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle it.
					
					 In an article titled "North-South Joint Declaration is Milestone of Korea's Reunification", the bulletin explained how the joint declaration was published and the basic idea of the June 15 joint declaration.
					
					 Noting that the movement of the Korean people for national reunification made great successes under the banner of the declaration but it faced a grave crisis from last year due to the challenge of the  anti-reunification forces who wrested power in south Korea, the bulletin stressed the world wishes to see Korea reunified as early as possible.
